name: DoubleTrouble
description:
This is a local multiplayer prototyp made by 3 developers in 2 days, using  Unity Engine. 

The jam was hosted by Indieklassenfahrt and sponsored by Saftladen indie collective.

You need a controller to play the game. It was tested with a Xbox controller on a Windows 10. 

Use the right and left sticks to move the characters. To skip tutorial, press start. 

created by:

Shahriar Shahrabi @IRCSS, Leonard Schölch @Windspiek, Gerd Korken
